rows.label: qev018601_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ah, hello. This is the Shimmer & Savvy Financial
Group, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0002
rows.name:
Have too much miranium? Too too much?
Well, you can turn it into cash by fulfilling the requests
for miranium we posted to Mission Control![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0003
rows.name:
Then humans get money, I get money, and
everyone is very very happy. Er, right? Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0004
rows.name: Win-win-win, perhaps? What do you say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_JNK0010
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev018601_SEL0011
rows.name: Press May May for details.

rows.label: qev018601_JNK0020
rows.name: Suspect

rows.label: qev018601_SEL0021
rows.name: Wonder aloud if any of this is legal.

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0005
rows.name:
Shouldn't I be getting so so angry at your questioning,
or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0006
rows.name:
That's what humans do, isn't it? When you question
the legality of their actions?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0007
rows.name: So you want to hear about my alchemy, right? Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0008
rows.name:
Well, it's kind of a trade secret, you know?
But I suppose I could tell you if you become a VVIP.
That's a Very Very Important Person, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0009
rows.name:
All you need to do is bring me five pieces of arc sand
ore. Easy easy, yes? No-hassle terms, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0010
rows.name:
Oh, and Shimmer & Savvy Financial Group VVIPs also
receive a special VVIP miranium exchange rate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0011
rows.name:
Excellent deal, no? It's probably a great idea to join.
Really really great. Tell your friends, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0012
rows.name:
So I'll be waiting here for those five pieces of arc sand
ore then, okay? Any time is great, but soon is very
very great.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0013
rows.name:
You'll get rich, Shimmer & Savvy will get rich,
and then we'll all be rich together, right?
Maybe we can throw rich-people parties?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0014
rows.name:
Perhaps I'll let you in on the Shimmer & Savvy Financial
Group's secrets if you become a VVIP member, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0015
rows.name:
And you'll also receive a better miranium exchange
rate, you know? So please get those five pieces of
arc sand ore soon. ...Or maybe very very soon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0016
rows.name:
Oh, hello. Are you looking for the Shimmer & Savvy
Financial Group, perhaps? Then you're so so welcome. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0017
rows.name:
...Hmm? Oh! You're the customer looking to become a
VVIP member, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0018
rows.name:
Did you find the five pieces of arc sand ore?
Please show me, okay? Pretty pretty please.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0019
rows.name: OooOOOoooh! So so great![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0020
rows.name:
That should be enough to upgrade the alchemy engine
AND our profits, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0021
rows.name:
As such, I'm proud to announce that you're officially a
VVIP member of our esteemed group, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0022
rows.name:
Get ready for a much much better miranium exchange
rate from now on, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0023
rows.name:
Also, your banter with the master Ma-non alchemist
May May is completely complimentary, isn't it?
That's me, you see? So it's free. And fun. So so fun.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0024
rows.name:
Anyway, banter time begins now, okay?
You can ask me any question you like!
...If you like, that is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_JNK0030
rows.name: Ask about Money

rows.label: qev018601_SEL0031
rows.name: Find out how May May turns a profit.

rows.label: qev018601_JNK0040
rows.name: Ask for Advice

rows.label: qev018601_SEL0041
rows.name: Get some general tips for making it on Mira.

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0025
rows.name:
Er, well, step one is to throw a handful of miranium
into the super-duper alchemy engine I invented, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0026
rows.name:
And then boom, right? Heaps of other resources
eventually come flying out of the other side.
Cool, hey? Cool. Very very cool.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0027
rows.name:
Gold? Silver? No problem.
Those resources can be sold for credits, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0028
rows.name:
It's almost like printing money, perhaps? And more
miranium means I can receive much much more credits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0029
rows.name:
Amazing, yes? That's why I'm kind of a master Ma-non
alchemist, I suppose. Don't you agree?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0030
rows.name: Er, I'm an alchemist, right? Not a therapist.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0031
rows.name:
Oh, but all the credits you make as a VVIP member of
Shimmer and Savvy are sure to make you so so happy,
aren't they? Probably?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0032
rows.name:
By the way, did I mention you're currently a bronze
VVIP member?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0033
rows.name:
If you do more favors for me, you'll reach silver status
soon, okay? Very very soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018601_MSG0034
rows.name:
Silver VVIP members receive even better exchange
rates, you see? So please keep helping me out![ST:wait ]
